title: Aurite Agent Configuration
description: Configuration schema for agent components (supports both single objects and arrays)

items.description: Configuration schema for agent components in Aurite Agents

name.description: The unique name of the component.
name.title: Name

description.description: A brief description of the component.
description.title: Description

mcp_servers.description: List of mcp_server names this agent can use.
mcp_servers.title: Mcp Servers

auto.description: If true, an LLM will dynamically select client_ids for the agent at runtime.
auto.title: Auto

llm_config_id.description: ID of the LLMConfig to use for this agent.
llm_config_id.title: Llm Config Id

llm.description: LLM parameters to override the base LLMConfig.

system_prompt.description: The primary system prompt for the agent.
system_prompt.title: System Prompt

config_validation_schema.description: JSON schema for validating agent-specific configurations.
config_validation_schema.title: Config Validation Schema

include_history.description: Whether to include the conversation history, or just the latest message.
include_history.title: Include History

include_logging.description: Whether to enable Langfuse logging for this agent, overriding global settings.
include_logging.title: Include Logging

exclude_components.description: List of component names (tool, prompt, resource) to specifically exclude for this agent, even if provided by allowed clients.
exclude_components.title: Exclude Components

evaluation.description: Optional runtime evaluation. Set to the name of a file in config/testing, or a prompt describing expected output for simple evaluation.
evaluation.title: Evaluation
